message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity, and I'm willing to make a serious offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $875000. I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value and rarity.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $860000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as high as $860000. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer it to you for $870000. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and rarity, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
